pullRequest.body:
Adds a Repr instance for QuaternionAlgebra. A quaternion <w, x, y, z> is shown as "{ re := w, imI := x, imJ := y, imK := z }". The components are displayed as Cauchy sequences for quaternions over the Reals. 

---

PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

### PR summary [1495383ce1](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/13940/commits/1495383ce1ba82fefe0bd4d2b56470e60b964cf6)

#### Import changes

No significant changes to the import graph

---

#### Declarations diff

`+ instance [Repr R] {a b : R} : Repr ℍ[R, a, b]`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>
Could you add a test? There should be one somewhere that already tests complex numbers that you can copy. If you can't find it, I can have a look in a day or two.

@eric-wieser it seems like this might have fallen through the cracks. Are you happy?

bors d=eric-wieser

:v: eric-wieser can now approve this pull request. To approve and merge a pull request, simply reply with `bors r+`. More detailed instructions are available [here](https://bors.tech/documentation/getting-started/#reviewing-pull-requests).

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9670368310/job/26678952849)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9670368310/job/26678953222)

```suggestion
instance [Repr R] {a b : R} : Repr ℍ[R, a, b] where
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: add Repr instance for quaternions
